mosparams.description: Database Query is a Jambo query manager.

param.name: MULTI_SELECT_JOINER
param.label: Multi Select Joiner
param.description: Syntax to join input in a SQL statement for list variables - Used by variables of type Multiselect.

param.name: DATA_SOURCE
param.label: Data Source
param.description: You can obtain data for this variable either by a simple SQL query, defined below, or a DBQ Query

param.name: VARIABLE_SQL
param.default: SELECT field1 AS id, field2 AS value, field3 AS label FROM tablename ORDER BY value
param.label: SQL Query
param.description: Create a list of values by querying the Joomla database. The query must return the fields 'value' and 'label', which DBQ will use to generate options on the form. It can also return the field 'id' if you wish to use native attributes to identify each record.

param.name: ESCAPE_OVERRIDE
param.label: Escape Override
param.description: Do not escape the replacement value that will be used in the query.

param.name: VARIABLE_TEMPLATE_ID
param.label: Variable Template ID
param.description: Template ID for the variable's template file.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: On Change
param.description: You can configure a list variable to update another list variable. Both variables must be configured correctly for this to work, however.

param.name: ON_CHANGE_ENABLED
param.label: Enable On Change
param.description: Enable the update of other variables when a certain element is selected.

param.name: ON_CHANGE_TARGET_VARIABLE
param.label: On Change Target Variable Name
param.description: The name of the variable that should be updated.
